verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
How long will you <S%H3013>trouble<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H1792>break<s%> me in pieces with <S%H4405>words<s%>?
These <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> have you <S%H3637>reproached<s%> <S%H954>me<s%>: you are not ashamed that you make yourselves strange to <S%H1970>me<s%>.
And be it <S%H551>indeed<s%> that I have <S%H7686>erred<s%>, my <S%H4879>error<s%> remains with <S%H3885>myself<s%>.
If <S%H551>indeed<s%> you will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> yourselves against <S%H3198>me<s%>, and plead against me my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>:
<S%H3045>Know<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5791>overthrown<s%> <S%H5362>me<s%>, and has surrounded me with his <S%H4686>net<s%>.
<S%H6817>Behold<s%>, I cry out of <S%H2555>wrong<s%>, but I am not <S%H6030>heard<s%>: I cry <S%H7768>aloud<s%>, but there is no <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
He has fenced <S%H1443>up<s%> my <S%H734>way<s%> that I cannot <S%H5674>pass<s%>, and he has <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in my <S%H5410>paths<s%>.
He has <S%H6584>stripped<s%> me of my <S%H3519>glory<s%>, and <S%H5493>taken<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> from my <S%H7218>head<s%>.
He has <S%H5422>destroyed<s%> me on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and I am <S%H3212>gone<s%>: and my <S%H8615>hope<s%> has he <S%H5265>removed<s%> like a <S%H6086>tree<s%>.
He has also <S%H2734>kindled<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>, and he counts me unto him as one of his <S%H6862>enemies<s%>.

His <S%H1416>troops<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and raise <S%H5549>up<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> against <S%H2583>me<s%>, and encamp round <S%H5439>about<s%> my <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.
He has <S%H7368>put<s%> my <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me<s%>, and my acquaintance are truly estranged from <S%H2114>me<s%>.
My <S%H7138>kinsfolk<s%> have <S%H2308>failed<s%>, and my familiar <S%H3045>friends<s%> have forgotten <S%H7911>me<s%>.
They that <S%H1481>live<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and my <S%H519>maids<s%>, <S%H2803>count<s%> me for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>: I am an <S%H5237>alien<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
I <S%H7121>called<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and he gave me no <S%H6030>answer<s%>; I <S%H2603>entreated<s%> him <S%H1119>with<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H2114>strange<s%> to my <S%H802>wife<s%>, though I <S%H2589>entreated<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s sake of my own <S%H990>body<s%>.
<S%H5759>Yes<s%>, young sons <S%H3988>despised<s%> <S%H6965>me<s%>; I arose, and they spoke against <S%H1696>me<s%>.
All my <S%H5475>inward<s%> <S%H4962>friends<s%> <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> <S%H157>me<s%>: and they whom I loved are turned against <S%H2015>me<s%>.
My <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H1692>cleaves<s%> to my <S%H5785>skin<s%> and to my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and I am <S%H4422>escaped<s%> with the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of my <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
Have <S%H2603>pity<s%> upon <S%H2603>me<s%>, have pity upon <S%H7453>me<s%>, O you my friends; for the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> has touched <S%H5060>me<s%>.
Why do you <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me as <S%H410>God<s%>, and are not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>?
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> were <S%H645>now<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>! oh <S%H5414>that<s%> they were <S%H2710>printed<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%>!
That they were <S%H2672>engraved<s%> with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5842>pen<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>!
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, and that he shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> at the <S%H314>latter<s%> day upon the <S%H6083>earth<s%>:
And though <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%> worms <S%H5362>destroy<s%> this <S%H1320>body<s%>, yet in my flesh shall I <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>:

Whom I shall <S%H2372>see<s%> for <S%H5869>myself<s%>, and my eyes shall <S%H7200>behold<s%>, and not <S%H2114>another<s%>; though my <S%H3629>reins<s%> be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> inside <S%H2436>me<s%>.
But you should <S%H559>say<s%>, Why <S%H7291>persecute<s%> we <S%H8328>him<s%>, seeing the root of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> is found in <S%H4672>me<s%>?

Be you <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: for <S%H2534>wrath<s%> brings the <S%H5771>punishments<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> there is a <S%H1779>judgment<s%>.
